hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Ubuntu Chromium/71.0.3578.98 Chrome/71.0.3578.98 Safari/537.36
hopobject.body:
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">

<head>
  <title>BeagleBoard.org - Monthly Dog Dish</title>
  <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width" />
  <link rel="icon" href="https://beagleboard.org/static/beagle.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
  <style type="text/css">
    /* _layouts/november_2018.html */

    /**********************************************
    * Ink v1.0.5 - Copyright 2013 ZURB Inc        *
    **********************************************/

    /* Client-specific Styles and Reset */

    #outlook a {
      padding: 0;
    }

    body {
      width: 100% !important;
      min-width: 100%;
      -webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;
      -ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;
      margin: 0;
      padding: 0;
      background-color: #fff;
    }

    .ExternalClass {
      width: 100%;
    }

    .ExternalClass,
    .ExternalClass p,
    .ExternalClass span,
    .ExternalClass font,
    .ExternalClass td,
    .ExternalClass div {
      line-height: 100%;
    }

    #backgroundTable {
      margin: 0;
      padding: 0;
      width: 100% !important;
      line-height: 100% !important;
    }

    img {
      outline: none;
      text-decoration: none;
      -ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic;
      max-width: 100%;
      float: left;
      clear: both;
      display: block;
    }

    center {
      width: 100%;
      min-width: 580px;
    }

    a img {
      border: none;
    }

    p {
      margin: 0 0 0 10px;
    }

    table {
      border-spacing: 0;
      border-collapse: collapse;
    }

    td {
      word-break: break-word;
      -webkit-hyphens: auto;
      -moz-hyphens: auto;
      hyphens: auto;
      border-collapse: collapse !important;
    }

    table,
    tr,
    td {
      padding: 0;
      vertical-align: top;
      text-align: left;
    }

    hr {
      color: #d9d9d9;
      background-color: #d9d9d9;
      height: 1px;
      border: none;
    }

    /* Responsive Grid */

    table.body {
      height: 100%;
      width: 100%;
    }

    table.container {
      width: 580px;
      margin: 0 auto;
      text-align: inherit;
    }

    table.row {
      padding: 0px;
      width: 100%;
      position: relative;
    }

    table.container table.row {
      display: block;
    }

    td.wrapper {
      padding: 10px 20px 0px 0px;
      position: relative;
    }

    table.columns,
    table.column {
      margin: 0 auto;
    }

    table.columns td,
    table.column td {
      padding: 0px 0px 10px;
    }

    table.columns td.sub-columns,
    table.column td.sub-columns,
    table.columns td.sub-column,
    table.column td.sub-column {
      padding-right: 10px;
    }

    td.sub-column,
    td.sub-columns {
      min-width: 0px;
    }

    table.row td.last,
    table.container td.last {
      padding-right: 0px;
    }

    table.one {
      width: 30px;
    }

    table.two {
      width: 80px;
    }

    table.three {
      width: 130px;
    }

    table.four {
      width: 180px;
    }

    table.five {
      width: 230px;
    }

    table.six {
      width: 280px;
    }

    table.seven {
      width: 330px;
    }

    table.eight {
      width: 380px;
    }

    table.nine {
      width: 430px;
    }

    table.ten {
      width: 480px;
    }

    table.eleven {
      width: 530px;
    }

    table.twelve {
      width: 580px;
    }

    table.one center {
      min-width: 30px;
    }

    table.two center {
      min-width: 80px;
    }

    table.three center {
      min-width: 130px;
    }

    table.four center {
      min-width: 180px;
    }

    table.five center {
      min-width: 230px;
    }

    table.six center {
      min-width: 280px;
    }

    table.seven center {
      min-width: 330px;
    }

    table.eight center {
      min-width: 380px;
    }

    table.nine center {
      min-width: 430px;
    }

    table.ten center {
      min-width: 480px;
    }

    table.eleven center {
      min-width: 530px;
    }

    table.twelve center {
      min-width: 580px;
    }

    table.one .panel center {
      min-width: 10px;
    }

    table.two .panel center {
      min-width: 60px;
    }

    table.three .panel center {
      min-width: 110px;
    }

    table.four .panel center {
      min-width: 160px;
    }

    table.five .panel center {
      min-width: 210px;
    }

    table.six .panel center {
      min-width: 260px;
    }

    table.seven .panel center {
      min-width: 310px;
    }

    table.eight .panel center {
      min-width: 360px;
    }

    table.nine .panel center {
      min-width: 410px;
    }

    table.ten .panel center {
      min-width: 460px;
    }

    table.eleven .panel center {
      min-width: 510px;
    }

    table.twelve .panel center {
      min-width: 560px;
    }

    .body .columns td.one,
    .body .column td.one {
      width: 8.333333%;
    }

    .body .columns td.two,
    .body .column td.two {
      width: 16.666666%;
    }

    .body .columns td.three,
    .body .column td.three {
      width: 25%;
    }

    .body .columns td.four,
    .body .column td.four {
      width: 33.333333%;
    }

    .body .columns td.five,
    .body .column td.five {
      width: 41.666666%;
    }

    .body .columns td.six,
    .body .column td.six {
      width: 50%;
    }

    .body .columns td.seven,
    .body .column td.seven {
      width: 58.333333%;
    }

    .body .columns td.eight,
    .body .column td.eight {
      width: 66.666666%;
    }

    .body .columns td.nine,
    .body .column td.nine {
      width: 75%;
    }

    .body .columns td.ten,
    .body .column td.ten {
      width: 83.333333%;
    }

    .body .columns td.eleven,
    .body .column td.eleven {
      width: 91.666666%;
    }

    .body .columns td.twelve,
    .body .column td.twelve {
      width: 100%;
    }

    td.offset-by-one {
      padding-left: 50px;
    }

    td.offset-by-two {
      padding-left: 100px;
    }

    td.offset-by-three {
      padding-left: 150px;
    }

    td.offset-by-four {
      padding-left: 200px;
    }

    td.offset-by-five {
      padding-left: 250px;
    }

    td.offset-by-six {
      padding-left: 300px;
    }

    td.offset-by-seven {
      padding-left: 350px;
    }

    td.offset-by-eight {
      padding-left: 400px;
    }

    td.offset-by-nine {
      padding-left: 450px;
    }

    td.offset-by-ten {
      padding-left: 500px;
    }

    td.offset-by-eleven {
      padding-left: 550px;
    }

    td.expander {
      visibility: hidden;
      width: 0px;
      padding: 0 !important;
    }

    table.columns .text-pad,
    table.column .text-pad {
      padding-left: 10px;
      padding-right: 10px;
    }

    table.columns .left-text-pad,
    table.columns .text-pad-left,
    table.column .left-text-pad,
    table.column .text-pad-left {
      padding-left: 10px;
    }

    table.columns .right-text-pad,
    table.columns .text-pad-right,
    table.column .right-text-pad,
    table.column .text-pad-right {
      padding-right: 10px;
    }

    /* Block Grid */

    .block-grid {
      width: 100%;
      max-width: 580px;
    }

    .block-grid td {
      display: inline-block;
      padding: 10px;
    }

    .two-up td {
      width: 270px;
    }

    .three-up td {
      width: 173px;
    }

    .four-up td {
      width: 125px;
    }

    .five-up td {
      width: 96px;
    }

    .six-up td {
      width: 76px;
    }

    .seven-up td {
      width: 62px;
    }

    .eight-up td {
      width: 52px;
    }

    /* Alignment and Visibility Classes */

    table.center,
    td.center {
      text-align: center;
    }

    h1.center,
    h2.center,
    h3.center,
    h4.center,
    h5.center,
    h6.center {
      text-align: center;
    }

    span.center {
      display: block;
      width: 100%;
      text-align: center;
    }

    img.center {
      margin: 0 auto;
      float: none;
    }

    .show-for-small,
    .hide-for-desktop {
      display: none;
    }

    /* Typography */

    body,
    table.body,
    h1,
    h2,
    h3,
    h4,
    h5,
    h6,
    p,
    td {
      color: #222222;
      font-family: Arial, 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, sans-serif;
      font-weight: normal;
      padding: 0;
      margin: 0;
      text-align: left;
      line-height: 102%;
    }

    h1,
    h2,
    h3,
    h4,
    h5,
    h6 {
      word-break: normal;
    }

    h1 {
      font-size: 40px;
    }

    h2 {
      font-size: 36px;
    }

    h3 {
      font-size: 32px;
    }

    h4 {
      font-size: 28px;
    }

    h5 {
      font-size: 24px;
    }

    h6 {
      font-size: 20px;
    }

    body,
    table.body,
    p,
    td {
      font-size: 14px;
      line-height: 19px;
    }

    p.lead,
    p.lede,
    p.leed {
      font-size: 18px;
      line-height: 21px;
    }

    p {
      margin-bottom: 10px;
    }

    small {
      font-size: 10px;
    }

    a {
      color: #EE6826;
      text-decoration: none;
    }

    a:hover {
      color: #EE6826 !important;
    }

    a:active {
      color: #EE6826 !important;
    }

    a:visited {
      color: #EE6826 !important;
    }

    h1 a,
    h2 a,
    h3 a,
    h4 a,
    h5 a,
    h6 a {
      color: #EE6826;
    }

    h1 a:active,
    h2 a:active,
    h3 a:active,
    h4 a:active,
    h5 a:active,
    h6 a:active {
      color: #EE6826 !important;
    }

    h1 a:visited,
    h2 a:visited,
    h3 a:visited,
    h4 a:visited,
    h5 a:visited,
    h6 a:visited {
      color: #EE6826 !important;
    }

    /* Panels */

    .panel {
      background: #f2f2f2;
      border: 1px solid #d9d9d9;
      padding: 10px !important;
    }

    .sub-grid table {
      width: 100%;
    }

    .sub-grid td.sub-columns {
      padding-bottom: 0;
    }

    /* Buttons */

    table.button,
    table.tiny-button,
    table.small-button,
    table.medium-button,
    table.large-button {
      width: 50%;
      overflow: hidden;
    }

    table.button td,
    table.tiny-button td,
    table.small-button td,
    table.medium-button td,
    table.large-button td {
      display: block;
      width: auto !important;
      text-align: center;
      background: #de7224;
      border: 1px solid #353C3D;
      color: #ffffff;
      padding: 8px 0;
    }

    table.tiny-button td {
      padding: 5px 0 4px;
    }

    table.small-button td {
      padding: 8px 0 7px;
    }

    table.medium-button td {
      padding: 12px 0 10px;
    }

    table.large-button td {
      padding: 21px 0 18px;
    }

    table.button td a,
    table.tiny-button td a,
    table.small-button td a,
    table.medium-button td a,
    table.large-button td a {
      font-weight: bold;
      text-decoration: none;
      font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
      color: #ffffff;
      font-size: 16px;
    }

    table.tiny-button td a {
      font-size: 12px;
      font-weight: normal;
    }

    table.small-button td a {
      font-size: 16px;
    }

    table.medium-button td a {
      font-size: 20px;
    }

    table.large-button td a {
      font-size: 24px;
    }

    table.button:hover td,
    table.button:visited td,
    table.button:active td {
      background: #2795b6 !important;
    }

    table.button:hover td a,
    table.button:visited td a,
    table.button:active td a {
      color: #fff !important;
    }

    table.button:hover td,
    table.tiny-button:hover td,
    table.small-button:hover td,
    table.medium-button:hover td,
    table.large-button:hover td {
      background: #C3641A !important;
    }

    table.button:hover td a,
    table.button:active td a,
    table.button td a:visited,
    table.tiny-button:hover td a,
    table.tiny-button:active td a,
    table.tiny-button td a:visited,
    table.small-button:hover td a,
    table.small-button:active td a,
    table.small-button td a:visited,
    table.medium-button:hover td a,
    table.medium-button:active td a,
    table.medium-button td a:visited,
    table.large-button:hover td a,
    table.large-button:active td a,
    table.large-button td a:visited {
      color: #ffffff !important;
    }

    table.secondary td {
      background: #e9e9e9;
      border-color: #d0d0d0;
      color: #555;
    }

    table.secondary td a {
      color: #555;
    }

    table.secondary:hover td {
      background: #d0d0d0 !important;
      color: #555;
    }

    table.secondary:hover td a,
    table.secondary td a:visited,
    table.secondary:active td a {
      color: #555 !important;
    }

    table.success td {
      background: #5da423;
      border-color: #457a1a;
    }

    table.success:hover td {
      background: #457a1a !important;
    }

    table.alert td {
      background: #c60f13;
      border-color: #970b0e;
    }

    table.alert:hover td {
      background: #970b0e !important;
    }

    table.radius td {
      -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
      -moz-border-radius: 3px;
      border-radius: 3px;
    }

    table.round td {
      -webkit-border-radius: 500px;
      -moz-border-radius: 500px;
      border-radius: 500px;
    }

    /* Outlook First */

    body.outlook p {
      display: inline !important;
    }

    /*  Media Queries */

    @media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {

      table[class="body"] img {
        width: auto !important;
        height: auto !important;
      }

      table[class="body"] center {
        min-width: 0 !important;
      }

      table[class="body"] .container {
        width: 95% !important;
      }

      table[class="body"] .row {
        width: 100% !important;
        display: block !important;
      }

      table[class="body"] .wrapper {
        display: block !important;
        padding-right: 0 !important;
      }

      table[class="body"] .columns,
      table[class="body"] .column {
        table-layout: fixed !important;
        float: none !important;
        width: 100% !important;
        padding-right: 0px !important;
        padding-left: 0px !important;
        display: block !important;
      }

      table[class="body"] .wrapper.first .columns,
      table[class="body"] .wrapper.first .column {
        display: table !important;
      }

      table[class="body"] table.columns td,
      table[class="body"] table.column td {
        width: 100% !important;
      }

      table[class="body"] .columns td.one,
      table[class="body"] .column td.one {
        width: 8.333333% !important;
      }
      table[class="body"] .columns td.two,
      table[class="body"] .column td.two {
        width: 16.666666% !important;
      }
      table[class="body"] .columns td.three,
      table[class="body"] .column td.three {
        width: 25% !important;
      }
      table[class="body"] .columns td.four,
      table[class="body"] .column td.four {
        width: 33.333333% !important;
      }
      table[class="body"] .columns td.five,
      table[class="body"] .column td.five {
        width: 41.666666% !important;
      }
      table[class="body"] .columns td.six,
      table[class="body"] .column td.six {
        width: 50% !important;
      }
      table[class="body"] .columns td.seven,
      table[class="body"] .column td.seven {
        width: 58.333333% !important;
      }
      table[class="body"] .columns td.eight,
      table[class="body"] .column td.eight {
        width: 66.666666% !important;
      }
      table[class="body"] .columns td.nine,
      table[class="body"] .column td.nine {
        width: 75% !important;
      }
      table[class="body"] .columns td.ten,
      table[class="body"] .column td.ten {
        width: 83.333333% !important;
      }
      table[class="body"] .columns td.eleven,
      table[class="body"] .column td.eleven {
        width: 91.666666% !important;
      }
      table[class="body"] .columns td.twelve,
      table[class="body"] .column td.twelve {
        width: 100% !important;
      }

      table[class="body"] td.offset-by-one,
      table[class="body"] td.offset-by-two,
      table[class="body"] td.offset-by-three,
      table[class="body"] td.offset-by-four,
      table[class="body"] td.offset-by-five,
      table[class="body"] td.offset-by-six,
      table[class="body"] td.offset-by-seven,
      table[class="body"] td.offset-by-eight,
      table[class="body"] td.offset-by-nine,
      table[class="body"] td.offset-by-ten,
      table[class="body"] td.offset-by-eleven {
        padding-left: 0 !important;
      }

      table[class="body"] table.columns td.expander {
        width: 1px !important;
      }

      table[class="body"] .right-text-pad,
      table[class="body"] .text-pad-right {
        padding-left: 10px !important;
      }

      table[class="body"] .left-text-pad,
      table[class="body"] .text-pad-left {
        padding-right: 10px !important;
      }

      table[class="body"] .hide-for-small,
      table[class="body"] .show-for-desktop {
        display: none !important;
      }

      table[class="body"] .show-for-small,
      table[class="body"] .hide-for-desktop {
        display: inherit !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
  <style type="text/css">
    table.facebook td {
      background: #3b5998;
      border-color: #2d4473;
    }

    table.facebook:hover td {
      background: #2d4473 !important;
    }

    table.twitter td {
      background: #00acee;
      border-color: #0087bb;
    }

    table.twitter:hover td {
      background: #0087bb !important;
    }

    table.google-plus td {
      background-color: #DB4A39;
      border-color: #CC0000;
    }

    table.google-plus:hover td {
      background: #CC0000 !important;
    }

    .template-label {
      color: #ffffff;
      font-weight: bold;
      font-size: 11px;
    }

    .callout .panel {
      background: #ECF8FF;
      border-color: #b9e5ff;
    }

    .header {
      background-color: #de7224;
    }

    .footer .wrapper {
      background: #ebebeb;
    }

    .footer h5 {
      padding-bottom: 10px;
    }

    table.columns .text-pad {
      padding-left: 10px;
      padding-right: 10px;
    }

    table.columns .left-text-pad {
      padding-left: 10px;
    }

    table.columns .right-text-pad {
      padding-right: 10px;
    }

    @media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {

      table[class="body"] .right-text-pad {
        padding-left: 10px !important;
      }

      table[class="body"] .left-text-pad {
        padding-right: 10px !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
  <style type="text/css">
    .orange {
      background-color: #de7224;
    }

    .orangetype {
      color: #de7224;
    }

    .dkgreytype {
      color: #353C3D;
    }

    .white {
      background: #fff;
    }

    .panel1 {
      background: #f2f2f2;
      border: 1px solid #d9d9d9;
      padding: 10px !important;
    }
  </style>
</head>

<body style="background-color:#fff;">
  <table class="body">
    <tr>
      <td class="center" align="center" valign="top">
        <center>

          <table class="row header">
            <tr>
              <td class="center" align="center">
                <center>

                  <table class="container orange">
                    <tr>
                      <td class="wrapper last">

                        <table class="twelve columns">
                          <tr>
                            <td class="six sub-columns">
                              <a href="https://beagleboard.org/">
                                <img src="https://beagleboard.org/static/newsletter/images/beagle-hd-logo_dd.png" alt="BeagleBoard.org Foundation Logo" />
                              </a>
                            </td>
                            <td class="six sub-columns last" style="text-align:right; vertical-align:middle;">
                              <h5 style="text-align:right;">
                                <a href="https://beagleboard.org/newsletter/2019-02" style="text-align:right;color:#fff;font-size: 20px;">February 2019 Dog Dish</a>
                              </h5>
                            </td>
                            <td class="expander"></td>
                          </tr>
                        </table>

                      </td>
                    </tr>
                  </table>

                </center>
              </td>
            </tr>
          </table>

          <br />

          <table class="container white">
            <tr>
              <td>
                <!-- From The Foundation -->
                <table class="twelve columns">
                  <tr>
                    <td class="panel">
                      <h6 class="dkgreytype">from the foundation</h6>
                    </td>
                    <td class="expander"></td>
                  </tr>
                </table>
                <table class="row">
                  <tr>
                    <td class="wrapper last">

                      <table class="three columns">
                        <tr>
                          <td class="left-text-pad">

                            <img height="130" width="120" src="https://beagleboard.org/static/newsletter/images/christinelong.jpg" alt="Christine Long headshot"
                            />

                          </td>
                          <td class="expander"></td>
                        </tr>
                      </table>

                    </td>
                    <td class="wrapper last">

                      <table class="nine columns">
                        <tr>
                          <td class="left-text-pad">
                            <h6>
                              <a href="https://beagleboard.org/newsletter/2019-02">Love is the air!</a>
                            </h6>
                            </p><img src="https://beagleboard.github.io/newsletter/static/images/robotics-280px.png" alt="Embedded World."/><b>Love for Robotics in Education:</b> We love to see BeagleBoard.org® projects helping students prepare for the future in the world of electronics and coding. Check out our update on the hundreds of high school students being mentored in robotics by UC Berkeley students. <b>Love for Projects:</b> Read about nine-year-old Charlie who built his first PocketBeagle® project. <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_akd9dRLTbs"> Enjoy this video celebrating 10 years of BeagleBoard.org® projects</a> <b> Love for Industrial Developers:</b> From industrial robotics to building automation, new applications come to life in the hands of our community.  We have some exciting new things coming up for Industrial applications.  Get a sneak peek and meet with us at Embedded World, February 26-28 in Germany in February.</a> <br>—<strong>Christine Long</strong>, <em>Executive Director</em></p>
                          </td>
                        </tr>
                      </table>

                    </td>
                  </tr>
                </table>

                <!-- Blog Content start -->

                <table class="row">
                  <tr>
                    <td class="wrapper">

                      <table class="six columns">
                        <tr>
                          <td class="panel">
                            <h6 class="dkgreytype">articles</h6>
                          </td>
                          <td class="expander"></td>
                        </tr>
                      </table>
                      <p>
                        <br />
                      </p>
                                   <table class="six columns">
             <tr>
              <td class="left-text-pad">
               <h6><a href="https://bbb.io/@2159">Join BeagleBoard.org at Embedded World 2019</a></h6>
              </td>
             </tr>
             <tr>
              <td>
               <table class="six columns">
                <tr>
                 <td class="left-text-pad"><img alt="Join BeagleBoard.org at Embedded World 2019" width="270" src="https://beagleboard.github.io/newsletter/static/images/280px-ew-2019.png" class="cke_focus" />
                 </td>
                </tr>
               </table>
              </td>
             </tr>
             <tr>
              <td class="left-text-pad">
               Get a sneak peek at the latest boards and capes in Nuremberg, Germany February 26-28 in Booth 3A-121 and Sign-up for the PocketBeagle® hands-on workshop on February 27.
               <p><a href="https://bbb.io/@2159">Read more »</a></p>
              </td>
             </tr>
            </table>
            <br />
              <table class="six columns">
             <tr>
              <td class="left-text-pad">
               <h6><a href="https://bbb.io/@2136">Getting Started with Elementary School Students and PocketBeagle®</a></h6>
              </td>
             </tr>
             <tr>
              <td>
               <table class="six columns">
                <tr>
                 <td class="left-text-pad"><img alt="Getting Started with Elementary School Students and PocketBeagle®" width="270" src="https://beagleboard.github.io/newsletter/static/images/newsletter-2019-02_0002.jpg" class="cke_focus" />
                 </td>
                </tr>
               </table>
              </td>
             </tr>
             <tr>
              <td class="left-text-pad">
               Nine-year-old Charlie Jaffe shares his project with the community while his dad shares tips for parents getting started with the youngest developers of electronics and coding.
               <p><a href="https://bbb.io/@2136">Read more »</a></p>
              </td>
             </tr>
            </table>
            <br />
              <table class="six columns">
             <tr>
              <td class="left-text-pad">
               <h6><a href="https://beagleboard.org/p/edumip/edumip-13a29c">10 Year Anniversary Classic Project - EduMIP the Balancing Robot</a></h6>
              </td>
             </tr>
             <tr>
              <td>
               <table class="six columns">
                <tr>
                 <td class="left-text-pad"><img alt="10 Year Anniversary Classic Project - EduMIP the Balancing Robot" width="270" src="https://beagleboard.github.io/newsletter/static/images/newsletter-2019-02_0003.jpg" class="cke_focus" />
                 </td>
                </tr>
               </table>
              </td>
             </tr>
             <tr>
              <td class="left-text-pad">
               Used in educating hundreds of engineering students at UCSD, you can build your own mini-Segway with BeagleBone® Blue.
               <p><a href="https://beagleboard.org/p/edumip/edumip-13a29c">Read more »</a></p>
              </td>
             </tr>
            </table>
            <br />
              <table class="six columns">
             <tr>
              <td class="left-text-pad">
               <h6><a href="https://bbb.io/@2150">Educator Highlight -  Berkeley Students Mentor High School Robotics using BeagleBone® Black</a></h6>
              </td>
             </tr>
             <tr>
              <td>
               <table class="six columns">
                <tr>
                 <td class="left-text-pad"><img alt="Educator Highlight -  Berkeley Students Mentor High School Robotics using BeagleBone® Black" width="270" src="https://beagleboard.github.io/newsletter/static/images/newsletter-2019-02_0004.png" class="cke_focus" />
                 </td>
                </tr>
               </table>
              </td>
             </tr>
             <tr>
              <td class="left-text-pad">
               The Pioneers in Engineering program has reached hundreds of underserved high school students through robotics
               <p><a href="https://bbb.io/@2150">Read more »</a></p>
              </td>
             </tr>
            </table>
            <br />
 
                    </td>
                    <td class="wrapper last">
                      <table class="six columns">
                        <tr>
                          <td class="panel1">
                            <h6 class="dkgreytype">hot off the presses</h6>
                          </td>
                          <td class="expander"></td>
                        </tr>
                      </table>
                      <br />
                      <table class="row">
                        <tr>
                          <td class="wrapper">

                            <table class="two columns">
                              <tr>
                                <td>
                                  <a href="https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0722QNJC2">
                                    <img width="80" src="https://beagleboard.github.io/newsletter/static/images/newsletter-2019-02_0001.jpg" alt="BeagleBone® Robotic Projects" />
                                  </a>
                                </td>
                                <td class="expander"></td>
                              </tr>
                            </table>
                          </td>
                          <td class="wrapper last">

                            <table class="four columns">
                              <tr>
                                <td>
                                  <p>
                                    <a href="https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0722QNJC2">BeagleBone® Robotic Projects</a>
                                  </p><p>By Dr Richard Grimmett.<br><br>Now in it’s second edition, This book fast tracks you into robotics using BeagleBone® Blue with projects that walk, swim, roll, and fly.</p></td>
                                <td class="expander"></td>
                              </tr>
                            </table>

                          </td>
                        </tr>
                      </table>
                      <br />
                      <table class="six columns">
                        <tr>
                          <td class="panel1">
                            <h6 class="dkgreytype">cape corner</h6>
                          </td>
                          <td class="expander"></td>
                        </tr>
                      </table>
                      <br />
                      <table class="row">
                        <tr>
                          <td class="wrapper">

                            <table class="two columns">
                              <tr>
                                <td>
                                  <a href="https://beagleboard.org/capes">
                                    <img width="80" src="https://beagleboard.github.io/newsletter/static/images/newsletter-2019-02_0000.jpg" alt="Robotics Cape" />
                                  </a>
                                </td>
                                <td class="expander"></td>
                              </tr>
                            </table>
                          </td>
                          <td class="wrapper last">

                            <table class="four columns">
                              <tr>
                                <td>
                                  <p>
                                    <a href="https://beagleboard.org/capes">Robotics Cape</a>
                                  </p>9-axis IMU, Barometer, 4xH Bridge DC motor controllers, 8-Channel Servo output, 4 Quadrature encoder inputs, power management and more</td>
                                <td class="expander"></td>
                              </tr>
                            </table>

                          </td>
                        </tr>
                      </table>
                      <br />
                      <table class="six columns">
                        <tr>
                          <td class="panel1">
                            <h6 class="dkgreytype">events</h6>
                          </td>
                          <td class="expander"></td>
                        </tr>
                      </table>
                      <p> </p>
                      <table class="six columns">
                        <tr>
                          <td class="left-text-pad">
                                            <p><a href="https://beagleboard.org/show/ew/">Embedded World 2019 Exhibition & Conference, Nuremberg, Germany</a>
                 - February 26-28, 2019<br />
                 
                 <a href="https://beagleboard.org/show/ew/">more »</a>
               </p>
                 <p><a href="https://beagleboard.org/show/ew/">Linux Hands-On Workshop with PocketBeagle at Embedded World</a>
                 - February 27, 2019<br />
                 
                 <a href="https://beagleboard.org/show/ew/">more »</a>
               </p>
                 <p><a href="https://e-ale.org/scale17x/">SCaLE 17x E-Ale Hands-on-Workshop with PocketBeagle®</a>
                 - March 7-10, 2019<br />
                 
                 <a href="https://e-ale.org/scale17x/">more »</a>
               </p>
 
                          </td>
                        </tr>
                      </table>
                      <br />
                      <table class="six columns">
                        <tr>
                          <td class="panel">
                            <h6 class="dkgreytype">community topics</h6>
                          </td>
                          <td width="10" class="expander"></td>
                        </tr>
                      </table>
                      <br />              <table class="six columns">
             <tr>
              <td class="left-text-pad">
               <h6><a href="https://elinux.org/BeagleBoard/GSoC/Ideas">Ideas for Google Summer of Code 2019</a></h6>
              </td>
             </tr>

             <tr>
              <td class="left-text-pad">
               Students wanting to apply to GSoC can start engaging the BeagleBoard.org® community now
               <p><a href="https://elinux.org/BeagleBoard/GSoC/Ideas">Read more »</a>
               </p>
              </td>
             </tr>
            </table>
            <br />
              <table class="six columns">
             <tr>
              <td class="left-text-pad">
               <h6><a href="https://groups.google.com/forum/embed/?place=forum/beagleboard&showsearch=true&showpopout=true&showtabs=false&hideforumtitle=true&parenturl=http%3A%2F%2Fbeagleboard.org%2Fdiscuss#!category-topic/beagleboard/beaglebone-black/vp0EoJQmVSk">4D Systems display working with latest Debian release</a></h6>
              </td>
             </tr>

             <tr>
              <td class="left-text-pad">
               Updating the u-boot helped solve this cape debug
               <p><a href="https://groups.google.com/forum/embed/?place=forum/beagleboard&showsearch=true&showpopout=true&showtabs=false&hideforumtitle=true&parenturl=http%3A%2F%2Fbeagleboard.org%2Fdiscuss#!category-topic/beagleboard/beaglebone-black/vp0EoJQmVSk">Read more »</a>
               </p>
              </td>
             </tr>
            </table>
            <br />
              <table class="six columns">
             <tr>
              <td class="left-text-pad">
               <h6><a href="https://groups.google.com/forum/embed/?place=forum/beagleboard&showsearch=true&showpopout=true&showtabs=false&hideforumtitle=true&parenturl=http%3A%2F%2Fbeagleboard.org%2Fdiscuss#!category-topic/beagleboard/beaglebone-black/rFcrA6v74T4">PRU compliler optimization</a></h6>
              </td>
             </tr>

             <tr>
              <td class="left-text-pad">
               When using BeagleBone® to make a simple motor controller you can use PRU's to do the critical timing events.
               <p><a href="https://groups.google.com/forum/embed/?place=forum/beagleboard&showsearch=true&showpopout=true&showtabs=false&hideforumtitle=true&parenturl=http%3A%2F%2Fbeagleboard.org%2Fdiscuss#!category-topic/beagleboard/beaglebone-black/rFcrA6v74T4">Read more »</a>
               </p>
              </td>
             </tr>
            </table>
            <br />
              <table class="six columns">
             <tr>
              <td class="left-text-pad">
               <h6><a href="https://groups.google.com/forum/embed/?place=forum/beagleboard&showsearch=true&showpopout=true&showtabs=false&hideforumtitle=true&parenturl=https%3A%2F%2Fbeagleboard.org%2Fdiscuss#!category-topic/beagleboard/beaglebone-blue/2luFEUXt-Kg">Powering BeagleBone® Blue with Batteries</a></h6>
              </td>
             </tr>

             <tr>
              <td class="left-text-pad">
               Check out this thread and others on the forums for help powering your robots
               <p><a href="https://groups.google.com/forum/embed/?place=forum/beagleboard&showsearch=true&showpopout=true&showtabs=false&hideforumtitle=true&parenturl=https%3A%2F%2Fbeagleboard.org%2Fdiscuss#!category-topic/beagleboard/beaglebone-blue/2luFEUXt-Kg">Read more »</a>
               </p>
              </td>
             </tr>
            </table>
            <br />
 

                    </td>
